slide.title: SCHOOLS SCORCHED: Arson left important documents and books burnt in Baniachhal Govt Primary School polling centre yesterday. Photo: Star/Focus Bangla

SCHOOLS SCORCHED: A man points to the bottom of the stack of benches at Laksam Atakora Govt Primary School in Comilla where the arsonists tried to light a fire yesterday. Photo: Star/Focus Bangla
